articles.title: Red Sox beat Yankees in AL wild card, advance to division series - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: The Boston Red Sox defeated the New York Yankees in the American League wild card game, ousting their rivals in a battle at Fenway to claim a spot in the league division series.
articles.content: BOSTON (AP) _ As the ball sailed over the center field fence, landing 427 feet from the plate in a horde of happy Red Sox fans, Xander Bogaerts turned to the Boston dugout to flex his muscles before … [+6961 chars]

articles.title: Biden pitches investment plans amid deadlock in US Congress - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: US president travels to Michigan in effort to sell his infrastructure and social proposals to the American public.
articles.content: Facing a deadlock in Congress, United States President Joe Biden on Tuesday travelled to the state of Michigan to sell his ambitious social spending and infrastructure proposals directly to the Ameri… [+2908 chars]

articles.title: Donald Trump no longer one of America’s richest: Forbes - New York Daily News

articles.title: CDC reverses recommendations for holiday season, admits error - KOMO News
